data.persona: I come from the lower class. I do what I am told without question. I can not read. I have not seen my family in a long time.
data.description:
You are in the Underground Cavern.
The underground cavern is covered in precious metals and gems. In the wall, rubies, emeralds and sapphires sparkle. There is gold and silver, shining brightly. It is cool in the underground cavern.
There's a metal, a fabric, a diamond, a gold, a ruby, a silver, a sword, a sapphire, and a case here.
The cat and the bat are here.

You are carrying a rag, a small bucket, and a duster, and wearing a shoe and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the cat, because it's fur looks so pretty among the metals and gems I came to collect.
data.mid_motivation: I chased the cat through the underground cavern to this trophy room, where I can finally hug it.
data.long_motivation: I can finally have all the treasures I could ever want, and to top it all off, I get to hug a cat.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put metals and gems on case
